com.mlt.desktop.control

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.desktop.control.Control
      • com.mlt.desktop.control.Table
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TableRecord

    public class Table
extends Control
    Table extension. Note that this table by-passes the sort mechanism.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • adjustColumnWidth

        public void adjustColumnWidth(int column)
        Adjust the column size. Based on the current header and row-column preferred width, scanning a maximum number of rows randomly including the first and last rows.
        Parameters:
        column - The column number.

        public void setSelectedRange(int topRow,
                             int leftColumn,
                             int bottomRow,
                             int rightColumn,
                             boolean selected,
                             boolean clear)
        Set the range as selected/unselected.
        Parameters:
        topRow - Top row.
        leftColumn - Left column.
        bottomRow - Bottom row.
        rightColumn - Right column.
        selected - A boolean that indicates whether the range must be selected.
        clear - A boolean that indicated whether the list of previously selected ranges should be cleared.
